mapper.select: SELECT t.Code taskCode, taskid, '1' billType, goodsId, g.name goodsname, g.unitName unitName, goodsCode, CONCAT(perStackNumber,'*',stackBoxLevel) perStackNumber, sum(storageNumber) srcstorageNumber, GROUP_CONCAT(d.id) acceDetailIdString FROM t_stockin_acceptance_detail d LEFT JOIN t_stockin_acceptance_task t ON d.taskid=t.id LEFT JOIN t_doc_goods g ON d.goodsid = g.id GROUP BY taskid,goodsId HAVING t.Code =#{taskCode} and g.name=#{goodsname} and g.unitName=#{unitName}
